DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation novel deep TMS H-Coil design treatment measure post traumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) . Comparing real sham treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Deep Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) - Treatment Post Traumatic Stress Disorder
DOC.criteria: PTSD diagnosis per DSM IV Schizophrenia Bipolar I severe Axis II diagnosis risk factor convulsion drug / alcohol abuse
